An Introduction to Democratic Socialism and the Socialist Party of Boston
7-9 pm
Boston University
Student Lounge
590 Commonwealth Ave. (near the Blanford St T stop on the "B" Green Line)

Meet local activists with the Socialist Party USA
Learn what Democratic Socialism is all about in plain English
Find out how you can make an impact in today's movements, locally and globally

The Socialist Party of Boston is hosting this meeting for new people who want to learn about socialism and our work in Boston. Brief presentations and facilitation will be conducted by

David Schaich, local secretary and current SPUSA Campaign Clearinghouse Coordinator.
Matthew Andrews, local treasurer and current SPUSA National Committee member.

Plenty of time will be left for discussion to address the questions and interests of participants. This event is totally free and everyone is welcome to come!
